title: How to Get the Ghost Look

steps.headline: Dye your hair black if or bleach your hair platinum blonde because it shows a ghost mystical hair colour.
steps.description: Flaming red may also work. Grow your hair as long as you can. While you're growing your hair out, only trim it when you start to get split ends. Braid it every night before you go to sleep to prevent it from tangling. Try to keep the shine low. If you have pretty dark skin, keep your hair black put it in ringlets.

steps.headline: Spread foundation two shades lighter than your skin tone with a plastic makeup sponge over your face.
steps.description: If you have dark skin, don't get a foundation 10 times lighter than your actual skin color- this is really tacky. Then spread moisturizer over your face to smooth out your makeup. Apply a foundation one shade darker than the foundation you are wearing under your cheekbones.

steps.headline: Draw a heavy, thick line at you're lashline on your eyelids and under your eyes with a wide, black eye pencil.
steps.description: Spread charcoal or black eyeshadow over your lids and slightly over your eye crease if you have one. If you don't have an eye crease, spread it to the middle of your eyelid.

steps.headline: Apply lipstick that contrasts from the rest of your face, so your lips will stand out.
steps.description: Good colors may be black, a dark red, white, or purple. Alternatively, one might apply lipstick in a pastel color such as baby blue, bubblegum pink, or sea green. Put on black or red contacts on if you want. Grey, light blue, pale pink and overly bright natural colors work well also.

steps.headline: Paint your nails white, grey, black or light pink.
Tear up your tights and hose if they are plain or lace.
steps.description: If they are spider web, spider or skeleton, leave them as they are.

steps.headline: Sew patches on any tee shirts other than logo tees.
steps.description: Alternatively, you could wear old clothing (it could be a bit worn out and faded, or it could be what people wore a hundred years ago) or damaged clothing.

steps.headline: Wear skirts and dresses with obvious stitching up the side.
steps.description: Wear clothing that would be underwear in another era as outerwear, such as bloomers as shorts, petticoats as skirts, slips as dress, corsets as tops. Wear socks and hoodies with bones on them.

steps.headline: Wear Ghost jewelry.
steps.description: Lockets, wilted roses as pins, barbed wire hearts are very Ghost. Onyx, jet, gold, fake gold and amethysts and other crystals are best. Imitations are great too.

steps.headline: Listen to classical music, Gothic metal, neoclassical metal and other types of music with a strong classical music influence.

Black,grey, light blue or red contacts (optional)
White, grey, black or light pink nail polish
